title: German Silver Top looking for Team
body:
Hey im 20 Years old and playing toplane. I got 4 years of playing league played in high elo as support then switched to top on this acc. I am now looking for a serious Team thats involved in a Clan. I really want to get in a team where they have big Focus on anything in the game. Like Communication, Makroplay, picks and Bans, Teamcomps and so on. I have a good Headset ts and discord and speak english fluid. I got time on the weekend and during the week after 6 o'Clock CET.

If i got your interest just add me ingame: IDamnatioN

See ya on the rift
